resources.string: Please wait... Your purchase is in progress.
Do you want to try again?
You can purchase {GAME_NAME} with your credit card for {PRICE} *
Please fill your billing information below
Last 3 digits on the back of your card
You already have a Gameloft account
Pay directly without creating an account
Gameloft uses advanced encryption security technology to protect your credit card information.
**Your email address will be used exclusively to send you the bill.
Some of the information you entered is incorrect. Please check the sections in red below.
An account with that email address already exists. You can login with this email address or create a new account.
In order for us to process your payment, please fill in your billing information below.
The email address and/or password you entered are not correct. Please try again.
Your credit card has expired or is invalid. Please update your billing information below.
An invoice has just been sent to your email address as a record.
Your account has been successfully created!
Please enter your email address below. You will receive your password in a few seconds.
We\'re sorry, we couldn\'t find your email address. Please try again or register.
Please check your email, a new password has been sent.
Please confirm that you want to buy {ITEM} for {PRICE}.
This item can be purchased only by credit card. Please confirm that you want to buy {ITEM} for {PRICE}.
Your purchase could not be processed by our service. Do you want to continue your purchase using another payment method?
Your purchase could not be processed by our service. Do you want to try again?
Your item has been purchased correctly
Thank you for your purchase, your item has been added to your account!
Thank you for your purchase, your item will be added to your account later due a problem in the service!
Do you want to buy {QUANTITY} {ITEM} for {PRICE}?
Please choose your preferred payment method before continuing your purchase.
We are waiting for Boku to validate your purchase. Once the purchase is complete, we will update your item list.
Unable to retrieve a valid content profile for your operator.
Please tap CONTINUE to finalize the purchase.
Please tap CONTINUE to finalize the purchase.
We are waiting for your item delivery confirmation to validate your purchase. Once the purchase is complete, we will update your item list.
Your previous purchase was not successful. You were not charged.
\n\nDear customer, please click "Confirm Information" to agree to send an SMS to {SHORTCODE1} to buy the product.
Dear customer, please click "Confirm Payment" to agree to send another SMS to {SHORTCODE2} to complete your payment.\n\n
Thanks for using UMP Billing Service.\n\n
There was a problem while purchasing your item. Please verify that you have enough credits for this transaction and that you are getting a service signal.
